body:
@robertmeta
With this setup:

- I don't have to switch projects paths for my editor/IDE for each version
- don't have to changes tools scripts etc relying on my package path for each version
- don't have to `git pull` in every version directory
- don't have to `git push` in every version directory
- I have everything in one place (e.g. files inside the working copy that are gitignored)
